column4: Hello, I am trying to TAR some directory under Ubuntu, and untar that archive on Windows. The problem is that some sub-directories contain non-ASCII characters in their name
When I untar that archive on Windows I obtain a wrong file name.
i didn't know you could get non ascii chars in a file or directory.   maybe look at man tar
of course you can name a directory with é, è, à, ö etc.
